entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:22 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:22 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
